title: ALBR
name: Additional Labor
definition: Indicates that additional labor is requested and charges will be accepted in conjunction with this Access Service Request, (e.g., Sunday or out of normal business hour installation is bein g requested).
fieldNotes: If other labor is requested, the specific labor will be determined in verbal contact between the provider installation-control office and the customer implementation contact.
It is assumed the initiator has the authority to authorize these requests.
Entry in this field is not required if a "Y" has been entered in the Expedite (EXP) field.

validEntries.description: Overtime installation and testing with other providers
Testing with other providers and other labor
Overtime installation, testing with other providers and

usageNotes: Optional when the ACT field is "N", "C", "M" or "T", otherwise prohibited.
